item.title: Report X-2025061116
item.description:
Report X-2025061116

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-06-07
  • City: LATHAM
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: TWO GROUND PACKAGE WERE DISCOVERED LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THAT TRACKING NUMBER 1Z7R2F630310193651 CONTAINED (3) ONE GALLON CANS OF FLAMMABLE SEA FOAM MOTOR TREATMENT WITH ONE LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. TRACKING NUMBER 1Z7R2F630313650464 CONTAINED (2) ONE GALLON CANS OF FLAMMABLE SEA FOAM MOTOR TREATMENT WITH ONE LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THERE WERE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES. THESE PACKAGES WERE SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 7R2F63, OK PETROLEUM, 45 COMMERCE DR, HAUPPAUGE NY 11788-3945.

item.title: Report X-2025060453
item.description:
Report X-2025060453

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-29
  • City: EAST SYRACUSE
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: GROUND DECLARED DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE FOUDN LEAKING. DONNED PPE AND TOOK SPILL CART TO UNLOAD FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. FOUND CORROSIVE BOX ON FLOOR WITH WET BOTTOM. TESTED PH OF LIQUID AND USED DECISION TREE AND CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET TO CHECK FOR HAZARDS. USED LINED SPILL TRAY AND SODIUM BICARBONATE WITH SILVER SHIELD LINERS TO TRANSPORT BOX TO DAMAGE CAGE FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2025060106
item.description:
Report X-2025060106

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-09
  • City: RONKONKOMA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment was discovered leaking during sort operations. The package is an Overpack shipment, with an exterior fiberboard box surrounding 4 individual fiberboard boxes labelled with Flammable Liquid hazard labels, no UN# or PSN, each box is UN Specifications UN4G/Y5.0/S/21 (inner contents one 1-gallon plastic bottle, crumpled packing paper for dunnage). The plastic bottle leaked from the top/cap. All contents were placed in a salvage drum and held for FAA investigation.
